name: Andrzej Ito

My expertise encompasses frameworks and tools such as **TensorFlow**, **PyTorch**, and **scikit-learn**, enabling the development of advanced **neural networks** and **deep learning** applications. I have successfully led cross-functional teams, mentored junior engineers, and delivered impactful projects on platforms like **AWS**, **Google Cloud**, and **Azure**. My commitment to enhancing accessibility and prioritizing user experience is complemented by strong problem-solving skills and effective communication that drives teamwork and fosters technical excellence.
